alert.note: Alert for Logan; Simpson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 6:31PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Logan and southwestern Simpson Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 530 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Elkton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Logan and southwestern Simpson Counties, including the following locations... Neosheo, Dot, Lickskillet, Schley, Adairville, Keysburg, Schochoh, Schweizer, Oakville and Old Volney. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
